title: Global Citizen Festival: Watch the livestream here
text:
On Saturday, Sept. 28, the Global Citizen Festival will bring together top artists, world leaders and everyday activists to take action to end poverty. Queen + Adam Lambert, Pharrell Williams and Alicia Keys are some of the stars headlining this year's show in New York City’s Central Park. If you can't make the event, Yahoo Entertainment has you covered. Click the video above to watch a livestream of the concert with performances by OneRepublic, H.E.R. and Carole King.

Adam Lambert, Pharrell and Alicia Keys. (Photo: Getty Images) More

The event, hosted by Hugh Jackman and Deborra-Lee Furness, also features special guests French Montana, Ben Platt, Jon Batiste & Stay Human, David Gray and NCT 127. Global citizens have an impact on ending extreme poverty through the actions they take. Learn more right here.

MSNBC, Comcast NBCUniversal and iHeartMedia will serve as presenting media partners and will air the festival on MSNBC, iHeartMedia Radio Stations and on the iHeartRadio App.

(Editor's note: Yahoo's parent company, Verizon, is a sponsor of the Global Citizen Festival.)

description: Queen + Adam Lambert, Pharrell Williams and Alicia Keys are all set to perform.
